title: [Large-Scale] Workplace Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Using Web-Based Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Equations, Functions, Statistics) and Proficiency in Office Software
context.additional_context: Includes real-world math application cases to enhance workplace efficiency for professionals. Offers a self-directed learning environment combining biweekly offline workshops and an online platform.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistical techniques (mean, variance, standard deviation) required for work data analysis with 90% accuracy.
Learners can solve budget allocation optimization problems with 80% accuracy using simulation tools provided on the online platform.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in blended learning environments and submit records reflecting feedback at least three times.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
